texto: Bibliography.............................................................................................................................................................................................................................. 29 iv  ﻿ © ISO 2021 – All rights reserved ISO 10017:2021(E) ﻿ Foreword ISO (the International Organization for Standardization) is a worldwide federation of national standards bodies (ISO member bodies). The work of preparing International Standards is normally carried out through ISO technical committees. Each member body interested in a subject for which a technical committee has been established has the right to be represented on that committee.
